objects.name: Instructions
objects.string:
Ride the bike to the finish and see if you can beat 35 seconds!

Force must not exceed 9,000 and you must not land on your head or you will crash!

Up to pedal forward, Down to pedal back, Space to brake, Left/Right to rotate

Esc to reset scene.  Try to avoid big jumps as you will fall off the bike!

events.comment: Move Front suspension and crank to match physics.
Set Accel variable to 0 to detect if we get any pedal input
This fires if you're not accelerating - Sets the speed to 0 and disables motor (Freewheel)
Find how high above the ground we are?  and zoom camera in/out depending on height.
